channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 32 Torbay Road, 26th December
item.description:
Leaves and subsequent mud has been left at this location and surrounding street for months, with no adequate sweeping to keep the street in a clean condition.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Torbay Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gutters leaves, 26th December
item.description:
I’ve called twice and reported numerous times. The leaves were not cleared until 2 weeks ago. They left them in the gutters and drains. Every other road has been cleared, once again this end of Roding Road has been left.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roding Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Spilt bin rubbish, 26th December
item.description:
The blue bin was over and rubbish all over pavement.Blue bin was picked up but pile of rubbish left with light stuff left to blow all over street.This pavement had just been cleaned after many months and was looking very good.There is continuing problem with people dumping household waste which makes it very difficult when I walk my very frail husband.I wish council would put cameras up then people might think twice about dumping
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lichfield Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large laughing gas canister needs to be removed please, 26th December
item.description:
I found a large laughing gas canister in the street. I have placed it beside the green box in Aycliffe Close so it can be responsibly disposed of.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aycliffe Close, Southborough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street name sign, 26th December
item.description:
The street name sin that used to be sited on the grass verge (now 2 holes) is now leaning against my mums garden wall & fence!!!! …Waiting to fall on a passing pedestrian!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, St Margarets Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
